players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we all stay safe."
Charlie: "I'm shocked about Alice. We need to be really careful here - with only four of us to start, losing Alice puts us in a tough spot. We should share any information we have."
Charlie: "Bob, you've been awfully quiet. In a game this small, we need everyone participating. What are your thoughts on what happened to Alice?"
Diana: "I'm concerned that the mafia might be trying to cover up their tracks. Let's try to remember any unusual behavior or conversations we may have observed last night."
